step_feedback.feedback: For step 1, try to keep your elbows a bit straighter and your wrists more neutral. Focus on tightening your muscles as you bring your arms in.
In step 2, aim for straighter elbows and more neutral wrists as you extend your arms. Ensure you are fully relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
For step 3, continue to work on keeping your elbows straighter and wrists neutral when extending. Remember to relax your muscles fully as you exhale.
In step 4, focus on maintaining straighter elbows and neutral wrists throughout the movement. Ensure a complete muscle relaxation on the exhale.
For step 5, pay close attention to keeping your elbows straighter and wrists neutral. Make sure to fully relax your muscles as you exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms extended straight and your wrists neutral when you open them. Focus on fully relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
